member.name: T:DateTimeToNaturalTimeExtension
member.summary: Converts a date time to a readable natural time (i.e. '10 hours', '2 years') or relative time (i.e. '5 days ago').

member.name: M:DateTimeToNaturalTimeExtension.ToNaturalRelativeTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Renders the given date as a natural language string, appending the "ago" suffix like "10 minutes ago".

member.name: M:DateTimeToNaturalTimeExtension.ToNaturalTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Renders the given date as a natural language string, like "10 minutes".

member.name: M:DateTimeToNaturalTimeExtension.ToNaturalRelativeTime(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Renders the given date as a natural language string, appending the "ago" suffix like "10 minutes ago".

member.name: M:DateTimeToNaturalTimeExtension.ToNaturalTime(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Renders the given date as a natural language string, like "10 minutes".
